text: Bluffton is a town in Beaufort County, South Carolina, United States. The population was counted by the 2020 census at 27,716. Its population grew 882.7% from 2000 to 2010, which made it the fastest-growing municipality in South Carolina."Census 2010: South Carolina" USA Today, March 23, 2011. Accessed June 6, 2012. It also grew 121.2% from 2010 to 2020. Bluffton is the fifth largest city in South Carolina by land area."Southeastdiscovery"Southeast Discovery, Accessed June 12, 2012. ==References== Category:Towns in South Carolina
title: Bluffton, South Carolina
